item.title: Deep Dive: Cloud Backup for Slow Connections, Part I
item.description: In case further proof were needed, last month’s story about the companies that lost irreplaceable data in a literal towering inferno proves again that everyone with important files needs offsite backups. I don’t mean to make fun of the hosting provider or the companies who got caught without an offsite backup (OK, maybe them, a little bit). Keeping your data safe from a real-world catastrophe—whether you’re managing business infrastructure or New Folders (1) through (23) on your desktop—is challenging!
